header.title: Caffe Bar Art
header.tagline: Home of great coffee and even better atmosphere.

home.intro: Caffe Bar Art is easy to find in the center of Žitište village at Trg Oslobođenja - a place where tradition and modern atmosphere perfectly blend. We provide our guests with a unique experience that combines quality, warmth and authenticity. Our garden, surrounded by greenery and the shade of old trees, is a true oasis of peace. Whether you're looking for a morning energy boost with aromatic coffee or a relaxing evening with a refreshing drink, you'll find your corner of enjoyment here.

bar_section.title: Bar
bar_section.text1: Our rich drinks menu will satisfy every taste. From the best domestic and international beers, through premium spirits, to refreshing cocktails and soft drinks.
bar_section.text2: Every drink comes with a carefully selected atmosphere and a pleasant environment where you can enjoy time with friends.

gallery_section.title: Ambiance
gallery_section.text1: Peek into our world through the lens. Our gallery showcases moments of relaxation, great drinks and the unforgettable atmosphere that reigns at Caffe Bar Art.
gallery_section.text2: From morning coffee to evening events, every moment is special and worth remembering.

bar.subtitle: Enjoy our rich selection of beverages

about.title: About Us
about.text: A café that has been successfully operating for many years, owned by the Milinović family. Year after year we grow, expand and provide the residents of Žitište and surrounding areas with a pleasant atmosphere for coffee or evening gatherings.

atmosphere.title: Atmosphere
atmosphere.text: The ambiance in our garden gives a specific taste to our coffee. On Fridays and Saturdays in the evening hours, we turn to faster rhythms, providing the best entertainment in the area.

beers.title: Beers
beers.text: A large selection of beers from the Jelen group will leave no one thirsty. Pay attention to our promotions during sporting events, you'll drink Stella, Staropramen or Bavaria below regular price.

wines.title: Wines
wines.text: Zvonko Bogdan wines will bring color to even the palest faces. If the Subotica winery is outside your taste palette, you can always try something from BlaBla wines.

coffee.title: Coffee
coffee.text: Our Hausbrandt coffee, with its specific taste, will give you an extra burst of energy to overcome any obstacle that has befallen you that day.

cookie_consent.title: Cookies & Privacy
cookie_consent.message: We use Google Analytics cookies to understand how visitors use our site and improve your experience. Your data is anonymous and secure.
